Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:MCF-7 (IC50<10 µM); HL-60 (IC50=20 µM); Jurkat (IC50=23 µM); SNU-601 (IC50=25 µM); OCI-AML-2 (IC50=29 µM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human RBCs(18% hemolysis at  12.5 μM), Human RBCs(0% hemolysis at 0.19 μM, 0.39 μM, 0.78 μM, 1.56 μM, 3.12 μM, 6.25 μM)
Sequence Information.Comments: Pep27anal2 can penetrate the plasma membrane, and then induce apoptosis in both caspase-and cytochrome c-independent manner

Literature.Title: Functional and structural characteristics of anticancer peptide Pep27 analogues
Literature.Author: Lee DG, Hahm KS, Park Y, Kim HY, Lee W, Lim SC, Seo YK, Choi CH.
